author: Staff Reporter
text:
N. Deivaraj and a group of activists/philanthropists who run ‘New Deiva Hair Care Trust’ on Wednesday carried out hair dressing on 60 mentally challenged people who were living on the pavements in Tirupur city.

Clothes distributed

The team members, who got assistance of a few Rotarians, also bathed the mentally challenged people found near New Bus Stand, along Tirupur - Avinashi Road and nearby areas and distributed fresh set of clothes and food.

Orphans

The Trust was carrying out free hair dressing not only to mentally challenged people, but also the orphans and old people living in shelter homes, at regular intervals.
title: Trust gesture
